body: If building `netcdf-c~mpi`, the downstream HDF5 dependency was taking the default value for `mpi` and building a parallel HDF5 which is not correct.  Need to explicitly override the default `mpi` variant in HDF5 for an `netcdf-c~mpi` build.   This was broken in #9fdb94
title: NetCDF: Fix non-mpi hdf5 dependency
